title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually constant from 2009 to 2015, gradually increasing from 2015 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 796.4 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 366.24 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2019.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2009 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2012.
